students1

Class PerDaySchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • students1.Schedule
      • students1.PerDaySchedule

  • public class PerDaySchedule
extends Schedule
    This is code for Part 1. In this file, create a subclass named PerDaySchedule. This is a subclass of the Schedule Superclass. Schedule has a description (for example, "change the gear oil") and happens on one or more dates. A perdayschedule activity happens every day.
